name: Inspire Footprints: Interactive (Pre-Order if I)
description:
"IF we could aspire to give back to the world and to others just a portion of what we've gained, used or received, maybe at the end, we would truly leave a footprint worth following."

Inspire Footprints: Interactive is an application designed to help you select a destiny path that can inspire you to make a positive impact in our world and the people around you.

Each application is a self help tool and guide for improving yourself while making a positive impact on others. From education, health, goodwill, animal life, the environment and social justice, we hope to inspire and provide education on how we all can individually and collectively make a difference in our world and communities. You get access to all of our exclusive interactive applications and updates (developed by our team). All future applications/DLCs and content are also free at no additional cost.

Begin to build your page and profile and earn your footprint levels with community activity as well. We also work with other developers and partners to provide opportunities for organizations and small teams who are creating innovative games, media, content, inventions and products geared to educate, inspire or give back to others, our world or environment.

  • You get access to all of our self help applications and tools
  • Free access to future applications/DLCs at no additional cost
  • Free updates and additions
  • Ambassador opportunities for developers, organizations and small teams
  • Steam Key when application launches
  • Early Access to community (update profile, connect with others, create pages, groups, and more)

"Small steps can always lead to a broader path but it always begins with one step."

*We do NOT endorse any one social or cultural group nor are we affiliated with any political or religious group or establishment. We are NOT a donation or crowd funding organization. Soliciting for donations or funding on our platform is not allowed.
